item.description:
Dear Aussies,

To celebrate the start of summer we will be having another night of pool and bowling with the Canadians at Jillian's. Come meet your fellow Aussies and have a pint or two with your new friends from north of the border.

For those unfamiliar with this venue, we usually meet meet near the bar and pool tables on the second floor. Very easy to find, just walk to the left as you come through the door on the level 2.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Aussie Expat June Meetup
